views:
**Anonymous volume** - `docker run -v /app/data`


**Named Volume** - `docker run -v data:/app/data


**Bind Mount** - `docker run -v /path/to/code:/app/code`

Anonympus

- can not be shared accross container
- removes on container delete


Named volumes

- shared across containers
- can be re-used for some container
- survives container shutdown / restart
- not tied to one specific container

Bind Mounts

- location on host file
- survives container shutdown
